mapper.select: SELECT a.id AS "id", bst.transfer_no AS "transfer.transferNo", bsi.name AS "skuInfo.name", bpi.vendor_id AS "skuInfo.vendorId", bpi.vendor_name AS "skuInfo.vendorName", bsi.item_no AS "skuInfo.itemNo", bii.id AS "inventorySku.invInfo.id", bii.name AS "inventorySku.invInfo.name", bis.inv_type AS "inventorySku.invType", bis.sku_type AS "inventorySku.skuType", bis.id AS "inventorySku.id", bis.u_version AS "inventorySku.uVersion", a.in_qty AS "inQty", a.out_qty AS "outQty", a.sent_qty AS "sentQty", bis.stock_qty AS "inventorySku.stockQty" FROM biz_sku_transfer_detail a LEFT JOIN biz_sku_transfer bst ON bst.id = a.transfer_id LEFT JOIN biz_sku_info bsi ON bsi.id = a.sku_id LEFT JOIN biz_product_info bpi ON bpi.id = bsi.prod_id LEFT JOIN biz_inventory_sku bis ON bis.sku_id = bsi.id LEFT JOIN biz_inventory_info bii ON bii.id = bis.inv_id WHERE a.status = 1 AND bst.status = 1 AND (bst.biz_status = 40 or bst.biz_status = 50) AND bis.status = 1 AND bii.cust_id = #{centId} AND bsi.id = #{skuId} ORDER BY a.create_time ASC
